sourcesContent:
import "./ahc.css" export default function Ahc12() { return (

The law of least effort

  • Energy is precious and our brain is wired to conserve it whenever possible
  • Every action requires a certain amount of energy, the more energy it requires the less likely it is to occur
  • Trying to pump up motivation to stick with a hard habit is very difficult and requires lot of effort
  • The key is to make it as easy as possible in the moment to make things that payoff in the long run
  • Rather than trying to overcome the friction in life, you can try and reduce it
  • When we remove the points of friction that sap our energy we can achieve more with less effort
  • Increase the friction of bad habits and reduce the friction of good habits
) }
